Title: DataGrid RIA Services Extension for Silverlight
Description: This Extension helps Developers to get DisplayName for DataGrid column headers from RIA Services easily, all what you need is "add reference to library" and add to your existing DataGrid "attached property".
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This Extension helps Developers to get DisplayName for DataGrid column headers from RIA Services easily, all what you need is "add reference to library" and add to your existing DataGrid "attached property".
